Description: dreamy date drive is the second opening theme song for the second cour of the Owarimonogatari anime series as the theme of Hitagi Rendezvous. It was not used in the TV broadcast and is only available in the BD release of the anime.[1] It is the sixth opening of the Owarimonogatari anime over all.

#Background.text: Kei Haneoka and Satoru Kosaki composed the song along with Ryuichi Takada who did the arrangement. The song's lyrics were written by meg rock and is performed by Chiwa Saito, the voice actress of Hitagi Senjougahara.
